languages.text: "Известно ли тебе об импланте, именуемом омофагия? Это одно из благословений Всеотца, даруемых Астартес. Нервные узлы, связывающие стенки желудка и спинной мозг, позволяют мне усваивать информацию из генетического кода поглощаемой пищи".

"Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."
languages.original_text: "Известно ли тебе об импланте, именуемом омофагия? Это одно из благословений Всеотца, даруемых Астартес. Нервные узлы, связывающие стенки желудка и спинной мозг, позволяют мне усваивать информацию из генетического кода поглощаемой пищи".

traits.locale_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings of the Allfather granted to Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你知不知道有一种叫做‘基因侦测神经’的植入物？这是全父赐予阿斯塔特修士的祝福。这种神经节点会连接我们的胃壁与脊髓，让我们从食用的肉体的基因代码中获取信息。”
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: “你知不知道有一种叫做‘基因侦测神经’的植入物？这是全父赐予阿斯塔特修士的祝福。这种神经节点会连接我们的胃壁与脊髓，让我们从食用的肉体的基因代码中获取信息。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Ha oído hablar del implante conocido como el omófago? Es una de las bendiciones que nos da el Padre de todas las cosas a los Astartes. Unos nodos nerviosos conectan las paredes del estómago con la médula espinal y me permiten absorber información del código genético de la carne que devoro».
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha oído hablar del implante conocido como el omófago? Es una de las bendiciones que nos da el Padre de todas las cosas a los Astartes. Unos nodos nerviosos conectan las paredes del estómago con la médula espinal y me permiten absorber información del código genético de la carne que devoro».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「オモファギアというインプラントを知っているか？アスタルテスに与えられた全知の父の恩恵の一つだ。胃壁と脊髄をつなぐ神経節により、摂取した肉の遺伝子コードから情報を吸収することができる」
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: 「オモファギアというインプラントを知っているか？アスタルテスに与えられた全知の父の恩恵の一つだ。胃壁と脊髄をつなぐ神経節により、摂取した肉の遺伝子コードから情報を吸収することができる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr von dem Implantat, das man die Omophagea nennt? Es ist einer der Segen, die der Allvater den Astartes gewährt hat. Durch Nervenknoten, die mit der Magenwand und dem Rückenmark verbunden sind, kann ich Informationen aus dem genetischen Code des Fleischs absorbieren, das ich verzehre."
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr von dem Implantat, das man die Omophagea nennt? Es ist einer der Segen, die der Allvater den Astartes gewährt hat. Durch Nervenknoten, die mit der Magenwand und dem Rückenmark verbunden sind, kann ich Informationen aus dem genetischen Code des Fleischs absorbieren, das ich verzehre."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Connaissez-vous l'implant appelé omophagea ? C'est l'une des bénédictions que le Père de Tous a accordée aux Astartes. Les nerfs qui connectent les parois de mon estomac et ma moelle épinière me permettent d'absorber les informations contenues dans le code génétique de la chair que je consomme. »
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: « Connaissez-vous l'implant appelé omophagea ? C'est l'une des bénédictions que le Père de Tous a accordée aux Astartes. Les nerfs qui connectent les parois de mon estomac et ma moelle épinière me permettent d'absorber les informations contenues dans le code génétique de la chair que je consomme. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

languages.text: "Omofoji adındaki implantı duymuş muydun? Yücebaba'nın Astartes'ine sunduğu lütuflardan biridir. Mide duvarlarını ve omuriliği birbirine bağlayan sinir düğümleri, tükettiğim etin genetik kodundaki bilgileri öğrenmemi sağlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Do you know of the implant called the omophagea? It is one of the blessings the Allfather granted to his Astartes. Nerve nodes that connect the stomach walls and the spinal cord allow me to absorb information from the genetic code of the flesh I consume."

traits.locale_text: "Omofoji adındaki implantı duydunuz mu? Yücebaba'nın Astartes'ine sunduğu lütuflardan biridir. Mide duvarlarını ve omuriliği birbirine bağlayan sinir düğümleri, tükettiğim etin genetik kodundaki bilgileri öğrenmemi sağlıyor."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
